summary.para: 网络连通测试工具.

member.name: M:Common.Net.Ping.Send(System.String,System.Int32)

summary.para: 发送数据包到指定的远程计算机上.

member.param: 远程计算机的主机名或IP地址.
一个 System.Int32 值，指定(发送回送消息后)等待 ICMP 回送答复消息的最大毫秒数。

member.name: T:Common.DBUtility.SqlHelper
member.summary: The SqlHelper class is intended to encapsulate high performance, scalable best practices for common uses of SqlClient.

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand (that returns no resultset) against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand (that returns no resultset) against an existing database connection using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: an existing database connection
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand (that returns no resultset) using an existing SQL Transaction using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: an existing sql transaction
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteReader(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand that returns a resultset against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: SqlDataReader r = ExecuteReader(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: A SqlDataReader containing the results

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand that returns the first column of the first record against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: Object obj = ExecuteScalar(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: An object that should be converted to the expected type using Convert.To{Type}

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand that returns the first column of the first record against an existing database connection using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: Object obj = ExecuteScalar(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: an existing database connection
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: An object that should be converted to the expected type using Convert.To{Type}

member.name: T:Common.ChineseDate
member.summary: 关于中国农历历法的实用工具,有效年份从1901年---2050年

member.name: M:Common.ChineseDate.GetConstellation
member.summary: 获取指定日期的星座序号

member.name: M:Common.ChineseDate.GetConstellationName

summary.para: 获取指定日期的星座名称.
summary.example: 指定日期8月19日，返回“狮子座”。

member.returns: 返回星座名称。

member.name: M:Common.ChineseDate.l_GetLunarHolDay
member.summary: 计算公历当天对应的节气 0-23，-1表示不是节气

member.name: M:Common.ChineseDate.FormatMonth(System.UInt16,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 将数字月份转化为中文月份。

member.name: M:Common.ChineseDate.FormatLunarDay(System.UInt16)
member.summary: 将农历数字型日期转换为中文农历表示。 如农历7号，表示为“初七”。

member.name: M:Common.ChineseDate.GetLeapMonth(System.UInt16)
member.summary:
返回阴历iLunarYear年的闰月月份，如没有返回0
适用时间范围：1901年1月---2050年12月。

member.name: M:Common.ChineseDate.LunarMonthDays(System.UInt16,System.UInt16)

summary.para: 返回阴历iLunarYer年阴历iLunarMonth月的天数，
如果iLunarMonth为闰月，高字为第二个iLunarMonth月
的天数，否则高字为0 1901年1月---2050年12月

member.param: 阴历年.
阴历月.

member.name: M:Common.ChineseDate.LunarYearDays(System.UInt16)

summary.para: 获取阴历iLunarYear年的总天数。

member.param: 阴历年。
member.returns: 阴历iLunarYear年的总天数。

member.name: M:Common.ChineseDate.l_CalcLunarDate(System.UInt16@,System.UInt16@,System.UInt16@,System.UInt32)
member.summary: 计算从1901年1月1日过iSpanDays天后的阴历日期

member.name: M:Common.ChineseDate.FormatLunarYear
member.summary: 将数字表示的年份，转化为天干记年法表示的字符串。

member.name: T:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper
member.summary: The OleDbHelper class is intended to encapsulate high performance, scalable best practices for common uses of OleDbClient.

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.AttachParameters(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter[])
member.summary:
This method is used to attach array's of OleDbParameters to an OleDbCommand.
This method will assign a value of DbNull to any parameter with a direction of InputOutput and a value of null.
This behavior will prevent default values from being used, but this will be the less common case than an intended pure output parameter (derived as InputOutput) where the user provided no input value.
member.param: The command to which the parameters will be added
an array of OleDbParameters tho be added to command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.AssignParameterValues(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter[],System.Object[])
member.summary: This method assigns an array of values to an array of OleDbParameters.
member.param: array of OleDbParameters to be assigned values
array of objects holding the values to be assigned

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.PrepareCommand(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter[])
member.summary: This method opens (if necessary) and assigns a connection, transaction, command type and parameters to the provided command.
member.param: the OleDbCommand to be prepared
a valid OleDbConnection, on which to execute this command
a valid OleDbTransaction, or 'null'
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OleDbParameters to be associated with the command or 'null' if no parameters are required

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String)
member.summary: Execute an OleDbCommand (that returns no resultset and takes no parameters) against the database specified in the connection string.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders");
member.param: a valid connection string for an OleDbConnection
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter[])
member.summary: Execute an OleDbCommand (that returns no resultset) against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new OleDbParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a OleDbConnection
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OleDbParameters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Execute a stored procedure via an OleDbCommand (that returns no resultset) against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameter values. This method will query the database to discover the parameters for the stored procedure (the first time each stored procedure is called), and assign the values based on parameter order.
member.param: a valid connection string for a OleDbConnection
the name of the stored prcedure
an array of objects to be assigned as the input values of the stored procedure
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection,System.String)
member.summary: Execute an OleDbDbCommand (that returns no resultset and takes no parameters) against the provided OleDbConnection.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(conn, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders");
member.param: a valid OleDbConnection
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter[])
member.summary: Execute an OleDbCommand (that returns no resultset) against the specified OleDbConnection using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(conn, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new OleDbParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid OleDbConnection
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OleDbParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Execute a stored procedure via an OleDbCommand (that returns no resultset) against the specified OleDbConnection using the provided parameter values. This method will query the database to discover the parameters for the stored procedure (the first time each stored procedure is called), and assign the values based on parameter order.
member.param: a valid OleDbConnection
the name of the stored prcedure
an array of objects to be assigned as the input values of the stored procedure
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String)
member.summary: Execute an OleDbCommand (that returns no resultset and takes no parameters) against the provided OleDbTransaction.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(trans, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders");
member.param: a valid OleDbTransaction
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.summary: Execute an OleDbCommand (that returns no resultset) against the specified OleDbTransaction using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(trans, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "GetOrders", new OleDbParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid OleDbTransaction
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OleDbParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Execute a stored procedure via an OleDbCommand (that returns no resultset) against the specified OleDbTransaction using the provided parameter values. This method will query the database to discover the parameters for the stored procedure (the first time each stored procedure is called), and assign the values based on parameter order.

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteReader(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter[],Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.OleDbConnectionOwnership)
member.summary: Create and prepare an OleDbCommand, and call ExecuteReader with the appropriate CommandBehavior.
member.remarks:
If we created and opened the connection, we want the connection to be closed when the DataReader is closed.
If the caller provided the connection, we want to leave it to them to manage.
member.param: a valid OleDbConnection, on which to execute this command
a valid OleDbTransaction, or 'null'
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OleDbParameters to be associated with the command or 'null' if no parameters are required
indicates whether the connection parameter was provided by the caller, or created by OleDbHelper
member.returns: OleDbDataReader containing the results of the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteReader(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String)
member.summary: Execute an OleDbCommand (that returns a resultset and takes no parameters) against the database specified in the connection string.
member.remarks: e.g.: OleDbDataReader dr = ExecuteReader(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "GetOrders");
member.param: a valid connection string for an OleDbConnection
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
member.returns: an OleDbDataReader containing the resultset generated by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteReader(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Execute a stored procedure via an OleDbCommand (that returns a resultset) against the specified OleDbConnection using the provided parameter values. This method will query the database to discover the parameters for the stored procedure (the first time each stored procedure is called), and assign the values based on parameter order.
member.param: a valid OleDbConnection
the name of the stored procedure
an array of objects to be assigned as the input values of the stored procedure
member.returns: an OleDbDataReader containing the resultset generated by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteReader(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String)
member.summary: Execute an OleDbCommand (that returns a resultset and takes no parameters) against the provided OleDbTransaction.
member.remarks: e.g.: OleDbDataReader dr = ExecuteReader(trans, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "GetOrders");
member.param: a valid OleDbTransaction
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
member.returns: an OleDbDataReader containing the resultset generated by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteReader(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter[])
member.summary: Execute an OleDbCommand (that returns a resultset) against the specified OleDbTransaction using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: OleDbDataReader dr = ExecuteReader(trans, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "GetOrders", new OleDbParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid OleDbTransaction
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OleDbParameters used to execute the command
member.returns: an OleDbDataReader containing the resultset generated by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteReader(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Execute a stored procedure via an OleDbCommand (that returns a resultset) against the specified OleDbTransaction using the provided parameter values. This method will query the database to discover the parameters for the stored procedure (the first time each stored procedure is called), and assign the values based on parameter order.
member.param: a valid OleDbTransaction
the name of the stored prcedure
an array of objects to be assigned as the input values of the stored procedure
member.returns: an OleDbDataReader containing the resultset generated by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String)
member.summary: Execute a OleDbCommand (that returns a 1x1 resultset and takes no parameters) against the database specified in the connection string.
member.remarks: e.g.: int orderCount = (int)ExecuteScalar(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "GetOrderCount");
member.param: a valid connection string for a OleDbConnection
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or T-OleDb command
member.returns: an object containing the value in the 1x1 resultset generated by the command

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a OleDbCommand (that returns a 1x1 resultset) against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int orderCount = (int)ExecuteScalar(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "GetOrderCount", new OleDbParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a OleDbConnection
the CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
the stored procedure name or T-OleDb command
an array of OleDbParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an object containing the value in the 1x1 resultset generated by the command

member.name: T:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.OleDbConnectionOwnership
member.summary: this enum is used to indicate weather the connection was provided by the caller, or created by OleDbHelper, so that we can set the appropriate CommandBehavior when calling ExecuteReader()

member.name: F:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.OleDbConnectionOwnership.Internal
member.summary: Connection is owned and managed by OleDbHelper

member.name: F:Common.DBUtility.OleHelper.OleDbConnectionOwnership.External
member.summary: Connection is owned and managed by the caller

member.name: T:Common.DBUtility.OleDbHelperParameterCache
member.summary: OleDbHelperParameterCache provides functions to leverage a static cache of procedure parameters, and the ability to discover parameters for stored procedures at run-time.

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleDbHelperParameterCache.DiscoverSpParameterSet(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: resolve at run-time the appropriate set of OleDbParameters for a stored procedure
member.param: a valid connection string for a OleDbConnection
the name of the stored prcedure
weather or not to onclude ther return value parameter

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleDbHelperParameterCache.CacheParameterSet(System.String,System.String,System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter[])
member.summary: add parameter array to the cache
member.param: a valid connection string for an OleDbConnection
the stored procedure name or T-OleDb command
an array of OleDbParamters to be cached

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleDbHelperParameterCache.GetCachedParameterSet(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: retrieve a parameter array from the cache
member.param: a valid connection string for a OleDbConnection
the stored procedure name or T-OleDb command
member.returns: an array of OleDbParameters

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleDbHelperParameterCache.GetSpParameterSet(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the set of OleDbParameters appropriate for the stored procedure
member.remarks: This method will query the database for this information, and then store it in a cache for future requests.
member.param: a valid connection string for a OleDbConnection
the name of the stored prcedure
member.returns: an array of OleDbParameters

member.name: M:Common.DBUtility.OleDbHelperParameterCache.GetSpParameterSet(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the set of OleDbParameters appropriate for the stored procedure
member.remarks: This method will query the database for this information, and then store it in a cache for future requests.
member.param: a valid connection string for an OleDbConnection
the name of the stored procedure
a bool value indicating weather the return value parameter should be included in the results
member.returns: an array of OleDbParameters

member.name: T:Common.Web.FileUploader
member.summary: 文件上传控件 FileUploader ，可识别图片文件。

member.name: M:Common.Web.FileUploader.Upload(System.Web.HttpPostedFile)

summary.para: 上传一个文件到指定的文件夹。
保存路径由 SaveFilePath 属性指定。
返回的是已保存后的文件路径及文件名。

member.param: 上传的 System.Web.HttpPostedFile 类型的文件.
member.returns: 若保存成功,返回保存文件的路径名,若不成功,返回空字符串.

member.name: M:Common.Web.FileUploader.Save(System.Web.HttpPostedFile)
member.summary: 保存一个文件到指定的文件夹.
member.param: 上传的 System.Web.HttpPostedFile 类型的文件.
member.returns: 若保存成功,返回保存文件的路径名,若不成功,返回空字符串.

member.name: M:Common.Web.FileUploader.Delete(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)

summary.para: 删除指定目录中的文档。
说明：searchPattern 指定查找文档类型，格式如： *.jpg
dayBeforeNow ，指定删除几天前的文档。

member.param: 需要删除文件的绝对路径。
根据文档格式设置查找的筛选条件。如：“*.doc”。
设置要删除的历史文档离距离今天的天数。

member.name: M:Common.Web.FileUploader.Delete(System.String,System.Int32)

summary.para: 删除上传目录中满足筛选条件的文档。
说明：searchPattern 指定筛选文档的格式，格式如： *.jpg
dayBeforeNow ，指定要删除的历史文档离距离今天的天数。

member.param: 根据文档格式设置查找的筛选条件。如：“*.doc”。
指定要删除的历史文档离距离今天的天数。

member.name: P:Common.Web.FileUploader.UploadDir
member.summary: 文件保存的路径。磁盘物理路径。

member.name: P:Common.Web.FileUploader.EnableImageFilter
member.summary: 设置图片过滤器是否生效。默认为 false;
